name: Haka House Auckland K’ Road
description:
Experience the perfect blend of comfort and style at Haka House Auckland K'Road, a modern hostel located on the vibrant Karangahape Road, in one of the coolest neighbourhoods in Auckland’s CBD – with many great cafes, restaurants, bars and boutique shopping on its doorstep. 
Guests have the option to choose from cosy private rooms or lively shared dorms, all well-appointed with comfortable beds and practical furnishings, for a perfectly stress-free stay. The spacious communal areas and convenient facilities include a fully equipped kitchen, social lounge, laundry room and more.

houseRules.notes:
GENERAL
1.	We require full payment upon check in. Credit card details are required to confirm a booking. 
2.	All prices quoted are per person, per night, unless otherwise stated. 
3.	Double and twin rooms sleep two people, but may be booked for one person only. In this circumstance the room rate will apply. 
4.	Prices are quoted in New Zealand dollars, are subject to change without notice, and all persons are obliged to pay the overnight price current at the time of reservation. 
5.	Haka Lodge, its employees and contractors accept no responsibility for personal accidents, injury suffered or loss or damage to personal property while on hostel property. Travel Insurance is recommended. 
6.	The minimum age of guests is 18 years old.
7.	Haka Lodge, Haka Lodge Managers and staff retain the right to refuse accommodation at any time. 
8.	Should your plans change, please contact the hostel directly as soon as possible. 
9.	Whilst every endeavour will be made to ensure you are accommodated in the same room throughout your stay, due to limited availability at time of booking, it may be necessary for you to change rooms. If applicable, you will be advised of this at check-in. You will be accommodated in a room of similar or higher standard to that originally booked. 
10.	Due to limited availability at time of booking, multi-share accommodation for two or more guests may be provided in separate rooms. Every endeavour will be made to ensure this does not occur, but should this be necessary you will be advised at check-in.
11.	Bookings made through a third-party booking site are subject to that sites terms and conditions. Please be aware these may differ from ours. 
12.	During special events, or for the duration of a special offer, different terms & conditions may apply. 
13.	Haka Lodge Group are not responsible for any loss or damage to property during your stay with us. If you feel something of yours has been stolen, please report it to reception and we will take you through the necessary steps to report this to the authorities.
14.	If you are caught using or stealing any other guests property and/or food, you will be asked immediately to leave the premises and charges may be laid against you. 
15.	All non-guest visitors to Haka Lodges must make themselves known and sign-in at reception on arrival.
16.	Non-guest visitors are NOT allowed on Haka Lodge premises between 8pm-8am. Non-guests found on the premises between these times will be served with a Trespassing Notice and reported to the authorities where appropriate. 

CHECK IN
1.	Check in time is 14:00. If you arrive early, we offer free luggage storage until your room is ready. 
2.	Check out time is 10:00. If you fail to check out on time, you will be charged a $50 late check out fee to the credit card you checked in with. 
3.	Valid ID will be required at check in. Passports, driving licenses or government issues ID will be accepted.
4.	Any voucher given when booking pre-paid accommodation (from iSite etc) must be presented at check in. Full payment will be required if you do not have a voucher.

AMENDMENTS
1.	Amendments to the date of arrival cannot be made on the day of arrival and will be treated as a same day cancellation. This is regardless of the time of booking.

NON ARRIVALS
1.	If you do not advise the hostel you are cancelling, your card will be charged for the first night of your stay.

CANCELLATIONS
1.	For cancellations notified 48 hours or later  no charge. 
2.	For cancellations within 48 hours  we will take payment for the first night of your stay.
3.	For customers who fail to show for their booking  we will take payment for your full booking
4.	If you have booked through a third party site and wish to cancel, you must do so through that third party site. We cannot cancel third party bookings. 

IN-HOUSE POLICIES
1.	If the number of people in one room exceeds the number of beds paid for, Haka Lodge reserve the right to request payment for the extra guests and a trespass notice may be issued for everyone involved. In this case, no refund will be given.
2.	Any damages to the room or Haka Lodge property will be charged to the credit card given on check in. 
3.	We accept moderate, social alcohol consumption on Haka Lodge premises, but management reserve the right to ask overtly intoxicated guests to leave the premises and refuse them future accommodation where deemed appropriate. 
4.	Alcohol may only be consumed in communal living areas, such the lounge, kitchen or outdoor deck area and we ask that most drinking be done by 10:30pm.
5.	Drugs are not permitted on Haka Lodge premises. 
6.	Guests who set the fire alarm off with excess use of aerosol, use of matches or smoking cigarettes, will be charged the full fire service call out fee of $1500. 
7.	Smoking is not permitted indoors at Haka Lodge. Any customer found smoking indoors will be evicted and no refund will be given. Designated smoking areas may be available  please ask staff. We also do not allow smoke-less cigarettes or e-cigarettes to be used indoors - please use these outdoors in our smoking area. 
8.	Violations of any of the above policies will result in immediate eviction with no refund.
